verses.arabic: أَتَىٰٓ أَمْرُ ٱللَّهِ فَلَا تَسْتَعْجِلُوهُ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَـٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.english: The command of Allah is coming, so be not impatient for it. Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him.
verses.hausa: Al'amarin Allah yã zo, sabõda haka kada ku nẽmi hanzartãwarsa. Tsarkin Allah ya tabbata, kuma Ya ɗaukaka daga abin da suke yi na shirka.

verses.arabic: يُنَزِّلُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ بِٱلرُّوحِ مِنْ أَمْرِهِۦ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِۦٓ أَنْ أَنذِرُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُۥ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱتَّقُونِ
verses.english: He sends down the angels, with the inspiration of His command, upon whom He wills of His servants, [telling them], "Warn that there is no deity except Me; so fear Me."
verses.hausa: Yanã sassaukar da malã'iku da Rũhi daga umurninSaa kan wanda Yake so daga bãyinSa, cẽwa ku yi gargaɗi cẽwa: Lalle ne shĩ, bãbu abin bautãwa fãce Ni, sabõda haka ku bĩ Ni da taƙawa.

verses.arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ تَعَـٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.english: He created the heavens and earth in truth. High is He above what they associate with Him.
verses.hausa: Ya halicci sammai da ƙasa da gaskiya. Ya ɗaukaka daga abin da suke yi na shirka.

verses.arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.english: He created man from a sperm-drop; then at once, he is a clear adversary.
verses.hausa: Ya halicci mutum daga maniyyi, sai gã shi yanã mai husũma bayyananniya.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْأَنْعَـٰمَ خَلَقَهَا ۗ لَكُمْ فِيهَا دِفْءٌ وَمَنَـٰفِعُ وَمِنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.english: And the grazing livestock He has created for you; in them is warmth and [numerous] benefits, and from them you eat.
verses.hausa: Da dabbõbin ni'ima, Ya halicce su dõminku. A cikinsu akwai abin yin ɗumi da waɗansu amfãnõni, kuma daga gare su kuke ci.

verses.arabic: وَلَكُمْ فِيهَا جَمَالٌ حِينَ تُرِيحُونَ وَحِينَ تَسْرَحُونَ
verses.english: And for you in them is [the enjoyment of] beauty when you bring them in [for the evening] and when you send them out [to pasture].
verses.hausa: Kuma kunã da kyau a cikinsu a lõkacin da suke kõmõwa daga kĩwo da maraice da lõkacin da suke sakuwã.

verses.arabic: وَتَحْمِلُ أَثْقَالَكُمْ إِلَىٰ بَلَدٍ لَّمْ تَكُونُوا۟ بَـٰلِغِيهِ إِلَّا بِشِقِّ ٱلْأَنفُسِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكُمْ لَرَءُوفٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.english: And they carry your loads to a land you could not have reached except with difficulty to yourselves. Indeed, your Lord is Kind and Merciful.
verses.hausa: Kuma sunã ɗaukar kãyanku mãsu nauyi zuwa ga wani gari, ba ku kasance mãsu isa gare shi ba, fãce da tsananin wahalar rãyuka, Lalle ne Ubangijinka ne, haƙĩƙa, Mai tausayi, Maijin ƙai.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْخَيْلَ وَٱلْبِغَالَ وَٱلْحَمِيرَ لِتَرْكَبُوهَا وَزِينَةً ۚ وَيَخْلُقُ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: And [He created] the horses, mules and donkeys for you to ride and [as] adornment. And He creates that which you do not know.
verses.hausa: Kuma da dawãki da alfadarai da jãkuna, dõmin ku hau su, kuma da ƙawa. Kuma Yana halitta abin da ba ku sani ba.

verses.arabic: وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ قَصْدُ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَمِنْهَا جَآئِرٌ ۚ وَلَوْ شَآءَ لَهَدَىٰكُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.english: And upon Allah is the direction of the [right] way, and among the various paths are those deviating. And if He willed, He could have guided you all.
verses.hausa: Kuma ga Allah madaidaiciyar hanya take kuma daga gare ta akwai mai karkacẽwa. Kuma da Yã so, dã Ya shiryar da ku gabã ɗaya.

verses.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً ۖ لَّكُم مِّنْهُ شَرَابٌ وَمِنْهُ شَجَرٌ فِيهِ تُسِيمُونَ
verses.english: It is He who sends down rain from the sky; from it is drink and from it is foliage in which you pasture [animals].
verses.hausa: Shĩ ne Wanda Ya saukar da ruwa daga sama dõminku, daga gare shi akwai abin sha, kuma daga gare shi itãce yake, a cikinsa kuke yin kĩwo.

verses.arabic: يُنۢبِتُ لَكُم بِهِ ٱلزَّرْعَ وَٱلزَّيْتُونَ وَٱلنَّخِيلَ وَٱلْأَعْنَـٰبَ وَمِن كُلِّ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً لِّقَوْمٍ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
verses.english: He causes to grow for you thereby the crops, olives, palm trees, grapevines, and from all the fruits. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who give thought.
verses.hausa: Yanã tsirar da shũka game da shi, dõminku zaitũni da dabĩnai da inabai, kuma daga dukan 'yã'yan itãce. Lalle ne a cikin wancan haƙĩƙa, akwai ãyã ga mutãne waɗanda suke yin tunãni.

verses.arabic: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ وَٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ ۖ وَٱلنُّجُومُ مُسَخَّرَٰتٌۢ بِأَمْرِهِۦٓ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.english: And He has subjected for you the night and day and the sun and moon, and the stars are subjected by His command. Indeed in that are signs for a people who reason.
verses.hausa: Kuma Ya hõrẽ muku dare da wuni da rãnã da watã kuma taurãri hõrarru ne da umurninSa. Lalle ne a cikin wancan, haƙĩƙa, akwai ãyõyi ga mutãne waɗanda suke hankalta.

verses.arabic: وَمَا ذَرَأَ لَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مُخْتَلِفًا أَلْوَٰنُهُۥٓ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً لِّقَوْمٍ يَذَّكَّرُونَ
verses.english: And [He has subjected] whatever He multiplied for you on the earth of varying colors. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who remember.
verses.hausa: Kuma abin da Ya halitta muku a cikin ƙasa, yana mai sãɓãnin launukansa. Lalle ne a cikin wancan, haƙĩƙa, akwai ãyã ga mutãne waɗanda suke tunãwa.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى سَخَّرَ ٱلْبَحْرَ لِتَأْكُلُوا۟ مِنْهُ لَحْمًا طَرِيًّا وَتَسْتَخْرِجُوا۟ مِنْهُ حِلْيَةً تَلْبَسُونَهَا وَتَرَى ٱلْفُلْكَ مَوَاخِرَ فِيهِ وَلِتَبْتَغُوا۟ مِن فَضْلِهِۦ وَلَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.english: And it is He who subjected the sea for you to eat from it tender meat and to extract from it ornaments which you wear. And you see the ships plowing through it, and [He subjected it] that you may seek of His bounty; and perhaps you will be grateful.
verses.hausa: Kuma Shĩ ne Ya hõrẽ tẽku dõmin ku ci wani nama sãbõ daga gare shi, kuma kunã fitarwa, daga gare shi, ƙawã wadda kuke yin ado da ita. Kuma kuna ganin jirãge sunã yankan ruwa a cikinsa kuma dõmin ku yi nẽman (fatauci) daga falalarSa. Kuma mai yiwuwa ne kuna gõdẽwa.

verses.arabic: وَأَلْقَىٰ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ رَوَٰسِىَ أَن تَمِيدَ بِكُمْ وَأَنْهَـٰرًا وَسُبُلًا لَّعَلَّكُمْ تَهْتَدُونَ
verses.english: And He has cast into the earth firmly set mountains, lest it shift with you, and [made] rivers and roads, that you may be guided,
verses.hausa: Kuma Ya jẽfa, a cikin ƙasa, tabbatattun duwatsu dõmin kada ta karkata da ku, da kõguna da hanyõyi, ɗammãninku kunã shiryuwa.

verses.arabic: وَعَلَـٰمَـٰتٍ ۚ وَبِٱلنَّجْمِ هُمْ يَهْتَدُونَ
verses.english: And landmarks. And by the stars they are [also] guided.
verses.hausa: Kuma da waɗansu alãmõmi, kuma da taurãri sunã mãsu nẽman shiryuwa (ga tafiyarsu ta fatauci).

verses.arabic: أَفَمَن يَخْلُقُ كَمَن لَّا يَخْلُقُ ۗ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.english: Then is He who creates like one who does not create? So will you not be reminded?
verses.hausa: Shin, wanda Yake yin halitta yanã yin kama da wanda ba ya yin halitta? Shin fa, bã ku tunãwa?

verses.arabic: وَإِن تَعُدُّوا۟ نِعْمَةَ ٱللَّهِ لَا تُحْصُوهَآ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.english: And if you should count the favors of Allah, you could not enumerate them. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
verses.hausa: Kuma idan kun ƙidãya ni'imar Allah, bã ku iya lissafa ta. Lalle ne Allah, haƙĩƙa, Mai gãfara ne, Mai jin ƙai.

verses.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعْلِنُونَ
verses.english: And Allah knows what you conceal and what you declare.
verses.hausa: Kuma Allah Yanã sanin abin da kuke asirtãwa da abin da kuke bayyanãwa.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ لَا يَخْلُقُونَ شَيْـًٔا وَهُمْ يُخْلَقُونَ
verses.english: And those they invoke other than Allah create nothing, and they [themselves] are created.
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suke kira, baicin Allah, ba su halicci kõme ba, kuma sũ ne ake halittawa.

verses.arabic: أَمْوَٰتٌ غَيْرُ أَحْيَآءٍ ۖ وَمَا يَشْعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.english: They are, [in fact], dead, not alive, and they do not perceive when they will be resurrected.
verses.hausa: Matattũ ne, bã su da rai, kuma ba su san a wane lõkaci ake tãyar da su ba.

verses.arabic: إِلَـٰهُكُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ وَٰحِدٌ ۚ فَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ قُلُوبُهُم مُّنكِرَةٌ وَهُم مُّسْتَكْبِرُونَ
verses.english: Your god is one God. But those who do not believe in the Hereafter - their hearts are disapproving, and they are arrogant.
verses.hausa: Abin bautawarku, abin bautãwa ne guda, to, waɗanda ba su yin ĩmãni da Lãhira, zukãtansu mãsu musu ne, kuma su makangara ne.

verses.arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُسْتَكْبِرِينَ
verses.english: Assuredly, Allah knows what they conceal and what they declare. Indeed, He does not like the arrogant.
verses.hausa: Haƙĩƙa, lalle ne, Allah Yanã sanin abin da suke asirtãwa da abin da suke bayyanãwa. Lalle ne Shi, bã Ya Son mãsu girman kai.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُم مَّاذَآ أَنزَلَ رَبُّكُمْ ۙ قَالُوٓا۟ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.english: And when it is said to them, "What has your Lord sent down?" They say, "Legends of the former peoples,"
verses.hausa: Idan aka ce musu: "Mẽne ne Ubangijinku Ya saukar?" Sai su ce: "Tãtsũniyõyin mutãnen farko."

verses.arabic: لِيَحْمِلُوٓا۟ أَوْزَارَهُمْ كَامِلَةً يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۙ وَمِنْ أَوْزَارِ ٱلَّذِينَ يُضِلُّونَهُم بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ ۗ أَلَا سَآءَ مَا يَزِرُونَ
verses.english: That they may bear their own burdens in full on the Day of Resurrection and some of the burdens of those whom they misguide without knowledge. Unquestionably, evil is that which they bear.
verses.hausa: Dõmin su ɗauki zunubansu cikakku a Rãnar ¡iyãma, kuma daga zunuban waɗanda suke ɓatarwa bã da wani ilmi ba. To, abin da suke ɗauka na zunubi ya mũnana.

verses.arabic: قَدْ مَكَرَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَأَتَى ٱللَّهُ بُنْيَـٰنَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْقَوَاعِدِ فَخَرَّ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلسَّقْفُ مِن فَوْقِهِمْ وَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.english: Those before them had already plotted, but Allah came at their building from the foundations, so the roof fell upon them from above them, and the punishment came to them from where they did not perceive.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne waɗanda suke a gabãninsu sun yi mãkirci, sai Allah Ya je wa gininsu daga harsãshensa, sai rufi ya fãɗa a kansu daga bisansu, kuma azãba ta jẽ musu daga inda ba su sani ba.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ يُخْزِيهِمْ وَيَقُولُ أَيْنَ شُرَكَآءِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ كُنتُمْ تُشَـٰٓقُّونَ فِيهِمْ ۚ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْعِلْمَ إِنَّ ٱلْخِزْىَ ٱلْيَوْمَ وَٱلسُّوٓءَ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.english: Then on the Day of Resurrection He will disgrace them and say, "Where are My 'partners' for whom you used to oppose [the believers]?" Those who were given knowledge will say, "Indeed disgrace, this Day, and evil are upon the disbelievers" -
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan a Rãnar ¡iyãma (Allah) Yanã kunyatã su, kuma Yanã cẽwa: "Inã abõkan tãrayyaTa, waɗanda kuka kasance kunã gãbã a cikin ɗaukaka sha'aninsu?" Waɗanda aka bai wa ilmi suka ce: "Lalle ne wulãkanci a yau da cũta sun tabbata a kan kãfirai."

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ تَتَوَفَّىٰهُمُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ ظَالِمِىٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ ۖ فَأَلْقَوُا۟ ٱلسَّلَمَ مَا كُنَّا نَعْمَلُ مِن سُوٓءٍۭ ۚ بَلَىٰٓ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمٌۢ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: The ones whom the angels take in death [while] wronging themselves, and [who] then offer submission, [saying], "We were not doing any evil." But, yes! Indeed, Allah is Knowing of what you used to do.
verses.hausa: Waɗanda malãiku suke karɓar rãyukansu sunã mãsu zãluntar kansu. Sai suka jẽfa nẽman sulhu (suka ce) "Ba mu kasance muna aikata wani mummũnan aiki ba." Kayya! Lalle Allah ne Masani ga abin da kuka kasance kunã aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: فَٱدْخُلُوٓا۟ أَبْوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۖ فَلَبِئْسَ مَثْوَى ٱلْمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
verses.english: So enter the gates of Hell to abide eternally therein, and how wretched is the residence of the arrogant.
verses.hausa: Sai ku shiga ƙõfõfin Jahannama, kunã madawwama a cikinta. Sa'an nan tir da mazaunin mãsu girman kai.

verses.arabic: وَقِيلَ لِلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ مَاذَآ أَنزَلَ رَبُّكُمْ ۚ قَالُوا۟ خَيْرًا ۗ لِّلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا۟ فِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةٌ ۚ وَلَدَارُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ خَيْرٌ ۚ وَلَنِعْمَ دَارُ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.english: And it will be said to those who feared Allah, "What did your Lord send down?" They will say, "[That which is] good." For those who do good in this world is good; and the home of the Hereafter is better. And how excellent is the home of the righteous -
verses.hausa: Kuma aka ce wa waɗanda suka yi taƙawa, "Mẽne ne Ubangijinku Ya saukar?" Suka ce, "Alhẽri Ya saukar, ga waɗanda suka kyautata a cikin wannan dũniya akwai wani abu mai kyau, kuma haƙĩƙa, Lãhira ce mafi alhẽri." Kuma haƙĩƙa, mãdalla da gidan mãsu taƙawa.

verses.arabic: جَنَّـٰتُ عَدْنٍ يَدْخُلُونَهَا تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۖ لَهُمْ فِيهَا مَا يَشَآءُونَ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يَجْزِى ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.english: Gardens of perpetual residence, which they will enter, beneath which rivers flow. They will have therein whatever they wish. Thus does Allah reward the righteous -
verses.hausa: Gidãjen Aljannar zama sunã shigarsu, ƙõramu sunã gudãna daga ƙarƙashinsu, sunã da abin da suke so a cikinsu. Kamar haka Allah ke sãkã wa mãsu taƙawa.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ تَتَوَفَّىٰهُمُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ طَيِّبِينَ ۙ يَقُولُونَ سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْكُمُ ٱدْخُلُوا۟ ٱلْجَنَّةَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: The ones whom the angels take in death, [being] good and pure; [the angels] will say, "Peace be upon you. Enter Paradise for what you used to do."
verses.hausa: Waɗanda malã'iku suke karɓar rãyukansu sunã mãsu jin dãɗin rai, malã'ikun sunã cẽwa. "Aminci ya tabbata a kanku. Ku shiga Aljanna sabõda abin da kuka kasance kuna aikatãwa."

verses.arabic: هَلْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن تَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ أَوْ يَأْتِىَ أَمْرُ رَبِّكَ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ فَعَلَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ وَمَا ظَلَمَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَلَـٰكِن كَانُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ يَظْلِمُونَ
verses.english: Do the disbelievers await [anything] except that the angels should come to them or there comes the command of your Lord? Thus did those do before them. And Allah wronged them not, but they had been wronging themselves.
verses.hausa: Shin sunã jiran wani abu? Fãce malã'iku su jẽ musu kõ kuwa umurnin Ubangijinka. Kamar wancan ne waɗanda suke a gabãninsu, suka aikata. Kuma Allah bai zãlunce su ba, kuma amma kansu suka kasance sunã zãlunta.

verses.arabic: فَأَصَابَهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا عَمِلُوا۟ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
verses.english: So they were struck by the evil consequences of what they did and were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
verses.hausa: Sai mũnãnan abũbuwan da suka aikata ya sãme su, kuma abin da suka kasance sunã yi na izgili ya wajaba a kansu.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَشْرَكُوا۟ لَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مَا عَبَدْنَا مِن دُونِهِۦ مِن شَىْءٍ نَّحْنُ وَلَآ ءَابَآؤُنَا وَلَا حَرَّمْنَا مِن دُونِهِۦ مِن شَىْءٍ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ فَعَلَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ فَهَلْ عَلَى ٱلرُّسُلِ إِلَّا ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
verses.english: And those who associate others with Allah say, "If Allah had willed, we would not have worshipped anything other than Him, neither we nor our fathers, nor would we have forbidden anything through other than Him." Thus did those do before them. So is there upon the messengers except [the duty of] clear notification?
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suka yi shirki suka ce: "Dã Allah Yã so, dã bamu bautã wa kõme ba, baicinSa, mũ ko ubannimmu kuma dã ba mu haramta kõme ba, baicin abin da Ya haramta." Kamar wancan ne waɗanda suke a gabãninsu suka aikata. To, shin, akwai wani abu a kan Manzanni, fãce iyarwa bayyananniyã?

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ بَعَثْنَا فِى كُلِّ أُمَّةٍ رَّسُولًا أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱجْتَنِبُوا۟ ٱلطَّـٰغُوتَ ۖ فَمِنْهُم مَّنْ هَدَى ٱللَّهُ وَمِنْهُم مَّنْ حَقَّتْ عَلَيْهِ ٱلضَّلَـٰلَةُ ۚ فَسِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.english: And We certainly sent into every nation a messenger, [saying], "Worship Allah and avoid Taghut." And among them were those whom Allah guided, and among them were those upon whom error was [deservedly] decreed. So proceed through the earth and observe how was the end of the deniers.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, Mun aika a cikin kõwace al'umma da wani Manzo (ya ce): "Ku bauta wa Allah, kuma ku nĩsanci ¦ãgũtu." To, daga gare su akwai wanda Allah Ya shiryar, kuma daga cikinsu akwai wanda ɓata ta wajaba a kansa. Sai ku yi tafiya a cikin ƙasa, sa'an nan ku dũba yadda ãƙibar mãsu ƙaryatãwa ta kasance.

verses.arabic: إِن تَحْرِصْ عَلَىٰ هُدَىٰهُمْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِى مَن يُضِلُّ ۖ وَمَا لَهُم مِّن نَّـٰصِرِينَ
verses.english: [Even] if you should strive for their guidance, [O Muhammad], indeed, Allah does not guide those He sends astray, and they will have no helpers.
verses.hausa: Idan ka yi kwaɗayi a kan shiryuwarsu, to, lalle ne, Allah bã Ya shiryar da wanda yake ɓatarwa, kuma bã su da waɗansu mataimaka.

verses.arabic: وَأَقْسَمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ جَهْدَ أَيْمَـٰنِهِمْ ۙ لَا يَبْعَثُ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَمُوتُ ۚ بَلَىٰ وَعْدًا عَلَيْهِ حَقًّا وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: And they swear by Allah their strongest oaths [that] Allah will not resurrect one who dies. But yes - [it is] a true promise [binding] upon Him, but most of the people do not know.
verses.hausa: Kuma suka rantse da Allah iyãkar rantsuwarsu (cẽwa) Allah bã ya tãyar da wanda yake mutuwa! Na'am, Yanã tãyarwa. Wa'adi ne (Allah) Ya yi a kanSa tabbatacce, kuma amma mafi yawan mutãne ba su sani ba.

verses.arabic: لِيُبَيِّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى يَخْتَلِفُونَ فِيهِ وَلِيَعْلَمَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ كَـٰذِبِينَ
verses.english: [It is] so He will make clear to them [the truth of] that wherein they differ and so those who have disbelieved may know that they were liars.
verses.hausa: Dõmin Ya bayyana musu abin da suke sãɓã wa jũna a cikinsa, kuma dõmin waɗanda suka kãfirta su sani cẽwa lalle sũ ne suka kasance maƙaryatã.

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا قَوْلُنَا لِشَىْءٍ إِذَآ أَرَدْنَـٰهُ أَن نَّقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
verses.english: Indeed, Our word to a thing when We intend it is but that We say to it, "Be," and it is.
verses.hausa: Abin sani kawai, MaganarMu ga wani abu idan Mun nufe shi, Mu ce masa, "Ka kasance; sai yanã kasancẽwa.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هَاجَرُوا۟ فِى ٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا ظُلِمُوا۟ لَنُبَوِّئَنَّهُمْ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً ۖ وَلَأَجْرُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ أَكْبَرُ ۚ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: And those who emigrated for [the cause of] Allah after they had been wronged - We will surely settle them in this world in a good place; but the reward of the Hereafter is greater, if only they could know.
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suka yi hijira a cikin sha'anin Allah daga bãyan an zãlunce su, haƙĩƙa Munã zaunar da su a cikin dũniya da alhẽri kuma lalle lãdar Lãhira ce mafi girmã, dã sun kasance sunã sani.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ صَبَرُوا۟ وَعَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَتَوَكَّلُونَ
verses.english: [They are] those who endured patiently and upon their Lord relied.
verses.hausa: Waɗanda suka yi haƙuri, kuma ga Ubangijinsu suke dõgara.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن قَبْلِكَ إِلَّا رِجَالًا نُّوحِىٓ إِلَيْهِمْ ۚ فَسْـَٔلُوٓا۟ أَهْلَ ٱلذِّكْرِ إِن كُنتُمْ لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: And We sent not before you except men to whom We revealed [Our message]. So ask the people of the message if you do not know.
verses.hausa: Kuma ba Mu aika daga gabaninka ba, fãce waɗansu mazãje Muna yin wahayi zuwa gare su. Sai ku tambayi mutãnen Ambato idan kun kasance ba ku sani ba.

verses.arabic: بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ وَٱلزُّبُرِ ۗ وَأَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكَ ٱلذِّكْرَ لِتُبَيِّنَ لِلنَّاسِ مَا نُزِّلَ إِلَيْهِمْ وَلَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
verses.english: [We sent them] with clear proofs and written ordinances. And We revealed to you the message that you may make clear to the people what was sent down to them and that they might give thought.
verses.hausa: Da hujjõji bayyanannu da littattafai kuma Mun saukar da Ambato zuwa gare ka, dõmin ka bayyana wa mutãne abin da aka sassaukar zuwa gare su, kuma don ɗammãninsu su yi tunãni.

verses.arabic: أَفَأَمِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ مَكَرُوا۟ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ أَن يَخْسِفَ ٱللَّهُ بِهِمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ أَوْ يَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.english: Then, do those who have planned evil deeds feel secure that Allah will not cause the earth to swallow them or that the punishment will not come upon them from where they do not perceive?
verses.hausa: Shin fa, waɗanda suka yi mãkircin mũnãnan ayyuka sun amince da Allah, bã zai shafe ƙasa da su ba ko kuwa azãba bã zã ta je musu daga inda ba su sani ba?

verses.arabic: أَوْ يَأْخُذَهُمْ فِى تَقَلُّبِهِمْ فَمَا هُم بِمُعْجِزِينَ
verses.english: Or that He would not seize them during their [usual] activity, and they could not cause failure?
verses.hausa: Ko kuwa Ya kama su a cikin jujjuyawarsu? Sabõda haka ba su zama masu buwãya ba.

verses.arabic: أَوْ يَأْخُذَهُمْ عَلَىٰ تَخَوُّفٍ فَإِنَّ رَبَّكُمْ لَرَءُوفٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.english: Or that He would not seize them gradually [in a state of dread]? But indeed, your Lord is Kind and Merciful.
verses.hausa: Ko kuwa Ya kama su a kan naƙasa? To, lalle ne Ubangijinka haƙĩƙa Mai tausayi ne, Mai jin ƙai.

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَىٰ مَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَىْءٍ يَتَفَيَّؤُا۟ ظِلَـٰلُهُۥ عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ وَٱلشَّمَآئِلِ سُجَّدًا لِّلَّهِ وَهُمْ دَٰخِرُونَ
verses.english: Have they not considered what things Allah has created? Their shadows incline to the right and to the left, prostrating to Allah, while they are humble.
verses.hausa: Shin, ba su Iura ba da abin da Allah Ya halitta kõ mene ne inuwõyinsu suna karkata daga dãma da wajãjen hagu, suna masu sujada ga Allah, alhãli suna masu ƙasƙantar da kai?

verses.arabic: وَلِلَّهِ يَسْجُدُ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مِن دَآبَّةٍ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَهُمْ لَا يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ
verses.english: And to Allah prostrates whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth of creatures, and the angels [as well], and they are not arrogant.
verses.hausa: Kuma ga Allah, abin da yake a cikin sammai da ƙasa na dabba da mala'iku, suke yin sujada, kuma bã su kangara.

verses.arabic: يَخَافُونَ رَبَّهُم مِّن فَوْقِهِمْ وَيَفْعَلُونَ مَا يُؤْمَرُونَ ۩
verses.english: They fear their Lord above them, and they do what they are commanded.
verses.hausa: Suna tsõron Ubangijinsu daga bisansu, kuma suna aikata abin da ake umuruin su.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱللَّهُ لَا تَتَّخِذُوٓا۟ إِلَـٰهَيْنِ ٱثْنَيْنِ ۖ إِنَّمَا هُوَ إِلَـٰهٌ وَٰحِدٌ ۖ فَإِيَّـٰىَ فَٱرْهَبُونِ
verses.english: And Allah has said, "Do not take for yourselves two deities. He is but one God, so fear only Me."
verses.hausa: Kuma Allah Ya ce: "Kada ku riƙi abũbuwan bautãwa biyu. Abin sani kawai, wanda ake bautãwa guda ne, sa'an nan sai kuji tsõroNa, Ni kawai."

verses.arabic: وَلَهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَهُ ٱلدِّينُ وَاصِبًا ۚ أَفَغَيْرَ ٱللَّهِ تَتَّقُونَ
verses.english: And to Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth, and to Him is [due] worship constantly. Then is it other than Allah that you fear?
verses.hausa: Kuma Yana da abin da yake a cikin sammai da ƙasa, kuma Yana da addini wanda yake dawwamamme. Shin fa, wanin Allah kuke bĩ da taƙãwa?

verses.arabic: وَمَا بِكُم مِّن نِّعْمَةٍ فَمِنَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ ثُمَّ إِذَا مَسَّكُمُ ٱلضُّرُّ فَإِلَيْهِ تَجْـَٔرُونَ
verses.english: And whatever you have of favor - it is from Allah. Then when adversity touches you, to Him you cry for help.
verses.hausa: Kuma abin da yake a gare ku na ni'ima, to, daga Allah ne. Sa'an nan kuma idan cũta ta shãfeku, to, zuwa gare Shi kuke hargõwa.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِذَا كَشَفَ ٱلضُّرَّ عَنكُمْ إِذَا فَرِيقٌ مِّنكُم بِرَبِّهِمْ يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.english: Then when He removes the adversity from you, at once a party of you associates others with their Lord
verses.hausa: sa'an nan idan Ya kuranye cũtar daga gare ku, sai gã wani ɓangare daga gare ku game da Ubangijinsu sunã shirki.

verses.arabic: لِيَكْفُرُوا۟ بِمَآ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمْ ۚ فَتَمَتَّعُوا۟ ۖ فَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: So they will deny what We have given them. Then enjoy yourselves, for you are going to know.
verses.hausa: Dõmin su kãfirta da abin da Muka bã su. To, ku ji dãɗi, sa'an nan da sannu zã ku sani.

verses.arabic: وَيَجْعَلُونَ لِمَا لَا يَعْلَمُونَ نَصِيبًا مِّمَّا رَزَقْنَـٰهُمْ ۗ تَٱللَّهِ لَتُسْـَٔلُنَّ عَمَّا كُنتُمْ تَفْتَرُونَ
verses.english: And they assign to what they do not know a portion of that which We have provided them. By Allah, you will surely be questioned about what you used to invent.
verses.hausa: Kuma sunã sanya rabõ ga abin da ba su sani ba daga abin da Muka azurtã su. Ranstuwa da Allah! Lalle ne zã a tambaye ku daga abin da kuka kasance kunã ƙirƙirãwa.

verses.arabic: وَيَجْعَلُونَ لِلَّهِ ٱلْبَنَـٰتِ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ ۙ وَلَهُم مَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.english: And they attribute to Allah daughters - exalted is He - and for them is what they desire.
verses.hausa: Kuma sunã danganta 'ya'ya mãta ga Allah. Tsarkinsa yã tabbata! Kuma sũ ne da abin da suke sha'awa.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا بُشِّرَ أَحَدُهُم بِٱلْأُنثَىٰ ظَلَّ وَجْهُهُۥ مُسْوَدًّا وَهُوَ كَظِيمٌ
verses.english: And when one of them is informed of [the birth of] a female, his face becomes dark, and he suppresses grief.
verses.hausa: Kuma idan aka yi wa ɗayansu bushãra da mace sai fuskarsa ta wuni baƙa ƙirin, alhãli kuwa yanã mai cike da baƙin ciki.

verses.arabic: يَتَوَٰرَىٰ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ مِن سُوٓءِ مَا بُشِّرَ بِهِۦٓ ۚ أَيُمْسِكُهُۥ عَلَىٰ هُونٍ أَمْ يَدُسُّهُۥ فِى ٱلتُّرَابِ ۗ أَلَا سَآءَ مَا يَحْكُمُونَ
verses.english: He hides himself from the people because of the ill of which he has been informed. Should he keep it in humiliation or bury it in the ground? Unquestionably, evil is what they decide.
verses.hausa: Yanã ɓõyẽwa daga mutãne dõmin mũnin abin da aka yimasa bushãra da shi. Shin, zai riƙe shi a kan wulãkanci kõ zai turbuɗe shi a cikin turɓãya To, abin da suke hukuntãwa ya mũnana.

verses.arabic: لِلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ مَثَلُ ٱلسَّوْءِ ۖ وَلِلَّهِ ٱلْمَثَلُ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
verses.english: For those who do not believe in the Hereafter is the description of evil; and for Allah is the highest attribute. And He is Exalted in Might, the Wise.
verses.hausa: Ga waɗanda ba su yi ĩmãni da Lãhira ba akwai sifar cũta kuma ga Allah akwai sifa mafi ɗaukaka. Kuma shi ne Mabuwãyi, Mai hikima.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ يُؤَاخِذُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّاسَ بِظُلْمِهِم مَّا تَرَكَ عَلَيْهَا مِن دَآبَّةٍ وَلَـٰكِن يُؤَخِّرُهُمْ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهُمْ لَا يَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ سَاعَةً ۖ وَلَا يَسْتَقْدِمُونَ
verses.english: And if Allah were to impose blame on the people for their wrongdoing, He would not have left upon the earth any creature, but He defers them for a specified term. And when their term has come, they will not remain behind an hour, nor will they precede [it].
verses.hausa: Kuma dã Allah Yanã kãma mutãne da zãluncinsu, dã bai bar wata dabba ba a kan ƙasa. Kuma amma Yanã jinkirta musu zuwa ga ajali ambatacce. Sa'an nan idan ajalinsu ya zo, bã zã a yi musu jinkiri ba kõ da sa'a guda, kuma bã zã su gabãta ba.

verses.arabic: وَيَجْعَلُونَ لِلَّهِ مَا يَكْرَهُونَ وَتَصِفُ أَلْسِنَتُهُمُ ٱلْكَذِبَ أَنَّ لَهُمُ ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ ۖ لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّ لَهُمُ ٱلنَّارَ وَأَنَّهُم مُّفْرَطُونَ
verses.english: And they attribute to Allah that which they dislike, and their tongues assert the lie that they will have the best [from Him]. Assuredly, they will have the Fire, and they will be [therein] neglected.
verses.hausa: Kuma sunã sanyã wa Allah abin da suke ƙi, kuma harsunansu na siffanta ƙarya cẽwa lalle ne sunã da abũbuwa mãsu kyau. Bãbu shakka lalle ne sunã da wuta, kuma lalle sũ, waɗanda ake ƙyãlẽwa ne (a cikinta).

verses.arabic: تَٱللَّهِ لَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمَمٍ مِّن قَبْلِكَ فَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ فَهُوَ وَلِيُّهُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.english: By Allah, We did certainly send [messengers] to nations before you, but Satan made their deeds attractive to them. And he is the disbelievers' ally today [as well], and they will have a painful punishment.
verses.hausa: Rantsuwar Allah! Lalle ne haƙĩƙa Mun aika zuwa ga al'ummomi daga gabãninka, sai Shaiɗan ya ƙawãce musu ayyukansu, sabõda haka shĩ ne majiɓincinsu, a yau, kuma sunã da azãba mai raɗaɗi.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ إِلَّا لِتُبَيِّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى ٱخْتَلَفُوا۟ فِيهِ ۙ وَهُدًى وَرَحْمَةً لِّقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.english: And We have not revealed to you the Book, [O Muhammad], except for you to make clear to them that wherein they have differed and as guidance and mercy for a people who believe.
verses.hausa: Lalle ba Mu saukar da Littafi ba a kanka, fãce dõmin ka bayyanã musu abin da suka sãɓã wa jũna a cikinsa, kuma dõmin shiriya da rahama ga mutãne waɗanda suke yin ĩmãni.

verses.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَأَحْيَا بِهِ ٱلْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ مَوْتِهَآ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً لِّقَوْمٍ يَسْمَعُونَ
verses.english: And Allah has sent down rain from the sky and given life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who listen.
verses.hausa: Kuma Allah Yã saukar da ruwa daga sama, sa'an nan Ya rãyar da ƙasa da shi a bãyan mutuwarta. Lalle ne a cikin wannan haƙĩƙa akwai ãyã ga mutãne waɗanda suke saurãre.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ لَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ لَعِبْرَةً ۖ نُّسْقِيكُم مِّمَّا فِى بُطُونِهِۦ مِنۢ بَيْنِ فَرْثٍ وَدَمٍ لَّبَنًا خَالِصًا سَآئِغًا لِّلشَّـٰرِبِينَ
verses.english: And indeed, for you in grazing livestock is a lesson. We give you drink from what is in their bellies - between excretion and blood - pure milk, palatable to drinkers.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, kunã da abin lũra a cikin dabbõbin ni'ima; Munã shãyar da ku daga abin da yake a cikin cikunansu, daga tsakãnin tukar tumbi da jini nõno tsantsan mai sauƙin haɗiya ga mãsu shã.

verses.arabic: وَمِن ثَمَرَٰتِ ٱلنَّخِيلِ وَٱلْأَعْنَـٰبِ تَتَّخِذُونَ مِنْهُ سَكَرًا وَرِزْقًا حَسَنًا ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً لِّقَوْمٍ يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.english: And from the fruits of the palm trees and grapevines you take intoxicant and good provision. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who reason.
verses.hausa: Kuma daga 'ya'yan itãcen dabĩno da inabi. Kunã sãmudaga gare shi, abin mãye da abinci mai kyau. Lalle a cikin wannan, haƙĩƙa, akwai ãyã ga mutãne waɗanda suke hankalta.

verses.arabic: وَأَوْحَىٰ رَبُّكَ إِلَى ٱلنَّحْلِ أَنِ ٱتَّخِذِى مِنَ ٱلْجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا وَمِنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ وَمِمَّا يَعْرِشُونَ
verses.english: And your Lord inspired to the bee, "Take for yourself among the mountains, houses, and among the trees and [in] that which they construct.
verses.hausa: Kuma Ubangjinka Yã yi wahayi zuwa ga ƙudan zuma cẽwa: "Ki riƙi gidãje daga duwãtsu, kuma daga itãce, kuma daga abin da suke ginãwa."

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ كُلِى مِن كُلِّ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِ فَٱسْلُكِى سُبُلَ رَبِّكِ ذُلُلًا ۚ يَخْرُجُ مِنۢ بُطُونِهَا شَرَابٌ مُّخْتَلِفٌ أَلْوَٰنُهُۥ فِيهِ شِفَآءٌ لِّلنَّاسِ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً لِّقَوْمٍ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
verses.english: Then eat from all the fruits and follow the ways of your Lord laid down [for you]." There emerges from their bellies a drink, varying in colors, in which there is healing for people. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who give thought.
verses.hausa: "Sa'an nan ki ci daga dukan 'ya'yan itãce, sabõda haka ki shiga hanyõyin Ubangijinka, sunã hõrarru." Wani abin shã yanã fita daga cikunanta, mai sãɓãwar launukansa a cikinsa akwai wata warkewa ga mutãne. Lalle ne, a cikin wannan, haƙĩƙa, akwaiãyõyi ga mutãne waɗanda suke yin tunãni.

verses.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ خَلَقَكُمْ ثُمَّ يَتَوَفَّىٰكُمْ ۚ وَمِنكُم مَّن يُرَدُّ إِلَىٰٓ أَرْذَلِ ٱلْعُمُرِ لِكَىْ لَا يَعْلَمَ بَعْدَ عِلْمٍ شَيْـًٔا ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ قَدِيرٌ
verses.english: And Allah created you; then He will take you in death. And among you is he who is reversed to the most decrepit [old] age so that he will not know, after [having had] knowledge, a thing. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Competent.
verses.hausa: Kuma Allah ne Ya halicce ku, sa'an nan Yanã karɓar rãyukanku, kuma daga gare ku akwai wanda ake mayarwã zuwa ga mafi ƙasƙncin rãyuwa, dõmin kada ya san kõme a bãyan dã ya zama mai ilmi. Lalle Allah ne Masani Mai ĩkon yi.

verses.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ فَضَّلَ بَعْضَكُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ فِى ٱلرِّزْقِ ۚ فَمَا ٱلَّذِينَ فُضِّلُوا۟ بِرَآدِّى رِزْقِهِمْ عَلَىٰ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُهُمْ فَهُمْ فِيهِ سَوَآءٌ ۚ أَفَبِنِعْمَةِ ٱللَّهِ يَجْحَدُونَ
verses.english: And Allah has favored some of you over others in provision. But those who were favored would not hand over their provision to those whom their right hands possess so they would be equal to them therein. Then is it the favor of Allah they reject?
verses.hausa: Kuma Allah Ya fifita sãshenku a kan sãshe a arziki. Sa'an nan waɗanda aka fĩfĩta ba su zama mãsu mayar da arzikinsu a kan abin da hannãyensu na dãma suka mallaka ba, har su zama daidai a cikinsa. Shin fa, da ni'imar Allah suke musu?

verses.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنْ أَنفُسِكُمْ أَزْوَٰجًا وَجَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنْ أَزْوَٰجِكُم بَنِينَ وَحَفَدَةً وَرَزَقَكُم مِّنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ ۚ أَفَبِٱلْبَـٰطِلِ يُؤْمِنُونَ وَبِنِعْمَتِ ٱللَّهِ هُمْ يَكْفُرُونَ
verses.english: And Allah has made for you from yourselves mates and has made for you from your mates sons and grandchildren and has provided for you from the good things. Then in falsehood do they believe and in the favor of Allah they disbelieve?
verses.hausa: Kuma Allah Yã sanya muku mãtan aure daga kãwunanku, kuma Ya sanya muku daga mãtan aurenku ɗiyã da jĩkõki, kuma Ya arzũta ku daga abũbuwa mãsu dãɗi. Shin fa, da ƙarya suke yin ĩmãni, kuma da ni'imar Allah sũ, suke kãfirta?

verses.arabic: وَيَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَمْلِكُ لَهُمْ رِزْقًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ
verses.english: And they worship besides Allah that which does not possess for them [the power of] provision from the heavens and the earth at all, and [in fact], they are unable.
verses.hausa: Kuma sunã bautã wa, baicin Allah, abin da yake bã ya mallakar wani arziki dõminsu, daga sammai da ƙasa game da kõme, kuma bã su iyawa (ga aikata kõme).

verses.arabic: فَلَا تَضْرِبُوا۟ لِلَّهِ ٱلْأَمْثَالَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ وَأَنتُمْ لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: So do not assert similarities to Allah. Indeed, Allah knows and you do not know.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan kada ku bãyar da waɗansu misãlai ga Allah. Lalle ne Allah Yanã sani, kuma kũ, ba ku sani ba.

verses.arabic: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلًا عَبْدًا مَّمْلُوكًا لَّا يَقْدِرُ عَلَىٰ شَىْءٍ وَمَن رَّزَقْنَـٰهُ مِنَّا رِزْقًا حَسَنًا فَهُوَ يُنفِقُ مِنْهُ سِرًّا وَجَهْرًا ۖ هَلْ يَسْتَوُۥنَ ۚ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ۚ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: Allah presents an example: a slave [who is] owned and unable to do a thing and he to whom We have provided from Us good provision, so he spends from it secretly and publicly. Can they be equal? Praise to Allah! But most of them do not know.
verses.hausa: Allah Yã buga wani misali da wani bãwa wanda bã ya iya sãmun ĩko a kan yin kõme, da (wani bãwa) wanda Muka azurtã shi daga gare Mu da arziki mai kyau. Sa'an nan shĩ yanã ciyarwa daga arzikin, a asirce da bayyane. Shin sunã daidaita? Gõdiya ta tabbata ga Allah. Ã'a mafi yawansu ba su sani ba.

verses.arabic: وَضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلًا رَّجُلَيْنِ أَحَدُهُمَآ أَبْكَمُ لَا يَقْدِرُ عَلَىٰ شَىْءٍ وَهُوَ كَلٌّ عَلَىٰ مَوْلَىٰهُ أَيْنَمَا يُوَجِّههُّ لَا يَأْتِ بِخَيْرٍ ۖ هَلْ يَسْتَوِى هُوَ وَمَن يَأْمُرُ بِٱلْعَدْلِ ۙ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.english: And Allah presents an example of two men, one of them dumb and unable to do a thing, while he is a burden to his guardian. Wherever he directs him, he brings no good. Is he equal to one who commands justice, while he is on a straight path?
verses.hausa: Kuma Allah Ya buga wani misãli, maza biyu, ɗayansu bẽbe ne, ba ya iya sãmun ikon yin kõme, kuma shi nauyi ne a kan mai mallakarsa, inda duk ya fuskantar da shi, bã ya zuwa da wani alhẽri. Shin, yanã daidaita, shi da (namiji na biyu) wanda yake umurni da a yi ãdalci kuma yanã a kan tafarki madaidaici?

verses.arabic: وَلِلَّهِ غَيْبُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَمَآ أَمْرُ ٱلسَّاعَةِ إِلَّا كَلَمْحِ ٱلْبَصَرِ أَوْ هُوَ أَقْرَبُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
verses.english: And to Allah belongs the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth. And the command for the Hour is not but as a glance of the eye or even nearer. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent.
verses.hausa: Kuma ga Allah gaibin sammai da ƙasa yake, kuma al'amarin Sã'a bai zama ba fãce kamar walƙãwar gani, kõ kuwa shĩ ne mafi kusa! Lalle Allah a kan dukan kõme Mai ikon yi ne.

verses.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ أَخْرَجَكُم مِّنۢ بُطُونِ أُمَّهَـٰتِكُمْ لَا تَعْلَمُونَ شَيْـًٔا وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۙ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.english: And Allah has extracted you from the wombs of your mothers not knowing a thing, and He made for you hearing and vision and intellect that perhaps you would be grateful.
verses.hausa: Kuma Allah ne Ya fitar da ku daga cikunan iyãyenku, ba da kunã sanin kõme ba, kuma Ya sanya muku ji da gannai da zukãta, tsammãninku zã ku gõde.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلطَّيْرِ مُسَخَّرَٰتٍ فِى جَوِّ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَا يُمْسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.english: Do they not see the birds controlled in the atmosphere of the sky? None holds them up except Allah. Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe.
verses.hausa: Shin ba su ga tsuntsãye ba sunã hõrarru cikin sararin sama bãbu abin da yake riƙe su fãce Allah? Lalle ne a cikin wancan haƙĩƙa, akwai ãyõyi ga mutãne waɗanda suke yin ĩmãni.

verses.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنۢ بُيُوتِكُمْ سَكَنًا وَجَعَلَ لَكُم مِّن جُلُودِ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ بُيُوتًا تَسْتَخِفُّونَهَا يَوْمَ ظَعْنِكُمْ وَيَوْمَ إِقَامَتِكُمْ ۙ وَمِنْ أَصْوَافِهَا وَأَوْبَارِهَا وَأَشْعَارِهَآ أَثَـٰثًا وَمَتَـٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
verses.english: And Allah has made for you from your homes a place of rest and made for you from the hides of the animals tents which you find light on your day of travel and your day of encampment; and from their wool, fur and hair is furnishing and enjoyment for a time.
verses.hausa: Kuma Allah ne Ya sanya muku daga gidajenku wurin natsuwa, kuma Ya sanya muku daga fatun dabbõbin ni'ima wasu gidãje kunã ɗaukar su da sauƙi a rãnar tafiyarku da rãnar zamanku, kuma daga sũfinsu da gãshinsu da gẽzarsu (Allah) Ya sanya muku kãyan ɗãki da na jin dãɗi zuwa ga wani lõƙaci.

verses.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّمَّا خَلَقَ ظِلَـٰلًا وَجَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْجِبَالِ أَكْنَـٰنًا وَجَعَلَ لَكُمْ سَرَٰبِيلَ تَقِيكُمُ ٱلْحَرَّ وَسَرَٰبِيلَ تَقِيكُم بَأْسَكُمْ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُتِمُّ نِعْمَتَهُۥ عَلَيْكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُسْلِمُونَ
verses.english: And Allah has made for you, from that which He has created, shadows and has made for you from the mountains, shelters and has made for you garments which protect you from the heat and garments which protect you from your [enemy in] battle. Thus does He complete His favor upon you that you might submit [to Him].
verses.hausa: Kuma Allah ne Ya sanyã muku inuwa daga abin da Ya halitta, kuma Ya sanyã muku ɗãkuna daga duwãtsu, kuma Ya sanyã muku waɗansu riguna sunã tsare muku zãfi, da waɗansu rĩguna sunã tsare muku makãminku. Kamar wancan ne (Allah) Yake cika ni'imarSa a kanku, tsammãnin ku, kuna sallamawa.

verses.arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
verses.english: But if they turn away, [O Muhammad] - then only upon you is [responsibility for] clear notification.
verses.hausa: To, idan sun jũya, to, abin da ya wajaba a kanka, shi ne iyarwã kawai, bayyananniyã.

verses.arabic: يَعْرِفُونَ نِعْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ يُنكِرُونَهَا وَأَكْثَرُهُمُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
verses.english: They recognize the favor of Allah; then they deny it. And most of them are disbelievers.
verses.hausa: Suna sanin ni'imar Allah, sa'an nan kuma sunã musunta, kuma mafi yawansu kãfirai ne.

verses.arabic: وَيَوْمَ نَبْعَثُ مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٍ شَهِيدًا ثُمَّ لَا يُؤْذَنُ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَلَا هُمْ يُسْتَعْتَبُونَ
verses.english: And [mention] the Day when We will resurrect from every nation a witness. Then it will not be permitted to the disbelievers [to apologize or make excuses], nor will they be asked to appease [Allah].
verses.hausa: Kuma a rãnar da Muke tãyar da mai shaida daga kõwace al'umma, sa'an nan kuma bã zã a yi izni ba ga waɗanda suka kãfirta, kuma ba su zama ana nẽman kõmawarsu ba.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا رَءَا ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ فَلَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنْهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنظَرُونَ
verses.english: And when those who wronged see the punishment, it will not be lightened for them, nor will they be reprieved.
verses.hausa: Kuma idan waɗanda suka yi zãlunci suka ga azãba, sa'an nan bã za a saukake ta daga gare su ba, kuma bã su zama anã yi musu jinkiri ba.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا رَءَا ٱلَّذِينَ أَشْرَكُوا۟ شُرَكَآءَهُمْ قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ شُرَكَآؤُنَا ٱلَّذِينَ كُنَّا نَدْعُوا۟ مِن دُونِكَ ۖ فَأَلْقَوْا۟ إِلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقَوْلَ إِنَّكُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ
verses.english: And when those who associated others with Allah see their "partners," they will say," Our Lord, these are our partners [to You] whom we used to invoke besides You." But they will throw at them the statement, "Indeed, you are liars."
verses.hausa: Kuma idan waɗanda suka yi shirka suka ga abũbuwan shirkarsu sai su ce: "Yã Ubangijinmu! Waɗannan ne abũbuwanshirkarmu waɗanda muka kasance munã kira baicinKa". Sai su jẽfamagana zuwa gare su, "Lalle ne ku, haƙĩƙa, maƙaryata ne."

verses.arabic: وَأَلْقَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلسَّلَمَ ۖ وَضَلَّ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَفْتَرُونَ
verses.english: And they will impart to Allah that Day [their] submission, and lost from them is what they used to invent.
verses.hausa: Kuma su shiga nẽman sulhu zuwa ga Allah a rãnar nan, kuma abin da suka kasance sunã ƙirƙirãwa ya ɓace daga gare su.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ زِدْنَـٰهُمْ عَذَابًا فَوْقَ ٱلْعَذَابِ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يُفْسِدُونَ
verses.english: Those who disbelieved and averted [others] from the way of Allah - We will increase them in punishment over [their] punishment for what corruption they were causing.
verses.hausa: Waɗanda suka kãfirta kuma suka kange daga hanyar, Allah, Mun ƙãra musu wata azãba bisa ga azãbar, sabõda abin da suka kasance sunã yi na fasãdi.

verses.arabic: وَيَوْمَ نَبْعَثُ فِى كُلِّ أُمَّةٍ شَهِيدًا عَلَيْهِم مِّنْ أَنفُسِهِمْ ۖ وَجِئْنَا بِكَ شَهِيدًا عَلَىٰ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ۚ وَنَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ تِبْيَـٰنًا لِّكُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَهُدًى وَرَحْمَةً وَبُشْرَىٰ لِلْمُسْلِمِينَ
verses.english: And [mention] the Day when We will resurrect among every nation a witness over them from themselves. And We will bring you, [O Muhammad], as a witness over your nation. And We have sent down to you the Book as clarification for all things and as guidance and mercy and good tidings for the Muslims.
verses.hausa: Kuma a rãnar da Muke tãyar da shaidu a cikin kõwace al'umma a kansu daga kãwunansu, kuma Muka zo da kai kanã mai bãyar da shaida a kan waɗannan, kuma Mun saussaukar da Littãli a kanka dõmin yin bãyani ga dukkan kõme da shiriya da rahama da bushãra ga mãsu mĩƙa wuya (Musulmi).

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَأْمُرُ بِٱلْعَدْلِ وَٱلْإِحْسَـٰنِ وَإِيتَآئِ ذِى ٱلْقُرْبَىٰ وَيَنْهَىٰ عَنِ ٱلْفَحْشَآءِ وَٱلْمُنكَرِ وَٱلْبَغْىِ ۚ يَعِظُكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.english: Indeed, Allah orders justice and good conduct and giving to relatives and forbids immorality and bad conduct and oppression. He admonishes you that perhaps you will be reminded.
verses.hausa: Lalle Allah nã yin umurni da ãdalci da kyautatãwa, da bai wa ma'abũcin zumunta, kuma yanã hani ga alfãsha da abin da aka ƙi da rarrabe jama'a. Yanã yi muku gargaɗi, ɗammãnin ku, kunã tunãwa.

verses.arabic: وَأَوْفُوا۟ بِعَهْدِ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا عَـٰهَدتُّمْ وَلَا تَنقُضُوا۟ ٱلْأَيْمَـٰنَ بَعْدَ تَوْكِيدِهَا وَقَدْ جَعَلْتُمُ ٱللَّهَ عَلَيْكُمْ كَفِيلًا ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ
verses.english: And fulfill the covenant of Allah when you have taken it, [O believers], and do not break oaths after their confirmation while you have made Allah, over you, a witness. Indeed, Allah knows what you do.
verses.hausa: Kuma ku cika da alkãwarin Allah idan kun yi alkawari, kuma kada ku warware rantsuwõyinku a bãyan ƙarfafa su, alhãli kuma haƙĩƙa kun sanya Allah Mai lãmuncẽwa a kanku. Kuma lalle Allah ne Yake sanin abin da kuke aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَكُونُوا۟ كَٱلَّتِى نَقَضَتْ غَزْلَهَا مِنۢ بَعْدِ قُوَّةٍ أَنكَـٰثًا تَتَّخِذُونَ أَيْمَـٰنَكُمْ دَخَلًۢا بَيْنَكُمْ أَن تَكُونَ أُمَّةٌ هِىَ أَرْبَىٰ مِنْ أُمَّةٍ ۚ إِنَّمَا يَبْلُوكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦ ۚ وَلَيُبَيِّنَنَّ لَكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ مَا كُنتُمْ فِيهِ تَخْتَلِفُونَ
verses.english: And do not be like she who untwisted her spun thread after it was strong [by] taking your oaths as [means of] deceit between you because one community is more plentiful [in number or wealth] than another community. Allah only tries you thereby. And He will surely make clear to you on the Day of Resurrection that over which you used to differ.
verses.hausa: Kuma kada ku kasance kamar wadda ta warware zarenta a bãyan tukka, ya zama warwararku, kunã riƙon rantsuwõyinku dõmin yaudara a tsakãninku, dõmin kasancẽwar wata al'umma tãfi rĩba daga wata al'umma! Abin sani kawai Allah Yanã jarrabar ku da shi, kuma lalle ne yanã bayyana muku a Rãnar ¡iyãma, abin da kuka kasance, a cikinsa, kunã sãɓã wajũna.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَجَعَلَكُمْ أُمَّةً وَٰحِدَةً وَلَـٰكِن يُضِلُّ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهْدِى مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَلَتُسْـَٔلُنَّ عَمَّا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: And if Allah had willed, He could have made you [of] one religion, but He causes to stray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And you will surely be questioned about what you used to do.
verses.hausa: Kuma dã Allah Ya so, haƙĩ ƙa, dã Ya sanya ku al'umma gudã, kuma Yanã ɓatar da wanda Ya so. kuma Yanã shiryar da wanda Ya so. Lalle ne anã tambayarku abin da kuka kasance kunã aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَتَّخِذُوٓا۟ أَيْمَـٰنَكُمْ دَخَلًۢا بَيْنَكُمْ فَتَزِلَّ قَدَمٌۢ بَعْدَ ثُبُوتِهَا وَتَذُوقُوا۟ ٱلسُّوٓءَ بِمَا صَدَدتُّمْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ وَلَكُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ
verses.english: And do not take your oaths as [means of] deceit between you, lest a foot slip after it was [once] firm, and you would taste evil [in this world] for what [people] you diverted from the way of Allah, and you would have [in the Hereafter] a great punishment.
verses.hausa: Kada ku riƙi rantsuwõyinku dõmin yaudara a tsakãninku, har ƙafa ta yi sulɓi a bãyan tabbatarta, kuma ku ɗanɗani azãba sabõda abin da kuka kange daga hanyar Allah. Kuma kunã da wata azãba mai girma.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَشْتَرُوا۟ بِعَهْدِ ٱللَّهِ ثَمَنًا قَلِيلًا ۚ إِنَّمَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ هُوَ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: And do not exchange the covenant of Allah for a small price. Indeed, what is with Allah is best for you, if only you could know.
verses.hausa: Kada ku sayi 'yan kuɗi kaɗan da alkawarin Allah. Lalle ne abin da yake a wurin Allah shi ne mafi alhẽri a gare ku, idan kun kasance kunã sani.

verses.arabic: مَا عِندَكُمْ يَنفَدُ ۖ وَمَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ بَاقٍ ۗ وَلَنَجْزِيَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ صَبَرُوٓا۟ أَجْرَهُم بِأَحْسَنِ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: Whatever you have will end, but what Allah has is lasting. And We will surely give those who were patient their reward according to the best of what they used to do.
verses.hausa: Abin da yake a wurinku yanã ƙãrẽwa, kuma abin da yake a wurin Allah ne mai wanzuwã. Kuma lalle ne, Munã sãka wa waɗanda suka yi haƙuri da lãdarsu da mafi kyãwun abin da suka kasance sunã aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: مَنْ عَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا مِّن ذَكَرٍ أَوْ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ فَلَنُحْيِيَنَّهُۥ حَيَوٰةً طَيِّبَةً ۖ وَلَنَجْزِيَنَّهُمْ أَجْرَهُم بِأَحْسَنِ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: Whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while he is a believer - We will surely cause him to live a good life, and We will surely give them their reward [in the Hereafter] according to the best of what they used to do.
verses.hausa: Wanda ya aikata aiki na ƙwarai daga namiji kõ kuwa mace, alhãli yanã mũmini, to, haƙĩƙa Munã rãyar da shi, rãyuwa mai dãɗi. Kuma haƙĩƙa Munã sãkã musu lãdarsu da mafi kyãwun abin da suka kasance sunã aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا قَرَأْتَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ فَٱسْتَعِذْ بِٱللَّهِ مِنَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ ٱلرَّجِيمِ
verses.english: So when you recite the Qur'an, [first] seek refuge in Allah from Satan, the expelled [from His mercy].
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan idan ka karantã Alƙur'ãni, sai ka nẽmi tsari ga Allah daga shaiɗan jẽfaffe.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ لَيْسَ لَهُۥ سُلْطَـٰنٌ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَتَوَكَّلُونَ
verses.english: Indeed, there is for him no authority over those who have believed and rely upon their Lord.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne shi, bã shi da wani ƙarfi a kan waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni, kuma sunã dõgara ga Ubangijinsu.

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا سُلْطَـٰنُهُۥ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَوَلَّوْنَهُۥ وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِهِۦ مُشْرِكُونَ
verses.english: His authority is only over those who take him as an ally and those who through him associate others with Allah.
verses.hausa: Abin sani kawai ƙarfinsa yanã a kan waɗanda suke jiɓintar sa, kuma waɗanda suke sũ, game da shi, mãsu shirki ne.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا بَدَّلْنَآ ءَايَةً مَّكَانَ ءَايَةٍ ۙ وَٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُنَزِّلُ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُفْتَرٍۭ ۚ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: And when We substitute a verse in place of a verse - and Allah is most knowing of what He sends down - they say, "You, [O Muhammad], are but an inventor [of lies]." But most of them do not know.
verses.hausa: Kuma idan Muka musanya wata ãyã a matsayin wata ãyã, kuma Allah ne Mafi sani ga abin da Yake saukarwa sai su ce: "Abin sani kawai, kai, aƙirƙiri ne." Ã'a, mafi yawansu bã swa sani.

verses.arabic: قُلْ نَزَّلَهُۥ رُوحُ ٱلْقُدُسِ مِن رَّبِّكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ لِيُثَبِّتَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَهُدًى وَبُشْرَىٰ لِلْمُسْلِمِينَ
verses.english: Say, [O Muhammad], "The Pure Spirit has brought it down from your Lord in truth to make firm those who believe and as guidance and good tidings to the Muslims."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Rũhul ¡udusi ne ya sassaukar da shi, daga Ubangijinka da gaskiya, dõmin ya tabbatar da waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni, kuma (dõmin) shiriya da bushãra ga Musulmi."

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ نَعْلَمُ أَنَّهُمْ يَقُولُونَ إِنَّمَا يُعَلِّمُهُۥ بَشَرٌ ۗ لِّسَانُ ٱلَّذِى يُلْحِدُونَ إِلَيْهِ أَعْجَمِىٌّ وَهَـٰذَا لِسَانٌ عَرَبِىٌّ مُّبِينٌ
verses.english: And We certainly know that they say, "It is only a human being who teaches the Prophet." The tongue of the one they refer to is foreign, and this Qur'an is [in] a clear Arabic language.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa Munã sanin (cẽwa) lalle ne sũ, sunã cẽwa, "Abin sani kawai wani mutum ne yake karantar da shi." Harshen wanda suke karkatai da maganar zuwa gare shi, Ba'ajame ne, kuma wannan (Alƙur'ãni) harshe ne Balãrabe bayyananne.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ لَا يَهْدِيهِمُ ٱللَّهُ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.english: Indeed, those who do not believe in the verses of Allah - Allah will not guide them, and for them is a painful punishment.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne waɗanda bã su yin ĩmãni da ãyõyin Allah, Allahbã zai shiryar da su ba, kuma sunã da azãba mai raɗaɗi.

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا يَفْتَرِى ٱلْكَذِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْكَـٰذِبُونَ
verses.english: They only invent falsehood who do not believe in the verses of Allah, and it is those who are the liars.
verses.hausa: Abin sani kawai waɗanda bã su yin ĩmãni da ãyõyin Allah, sũ ne suke ƙirƙira ƙarya. Kuma waɗannan sũ ne maƙaryata.

verses.arabic: مَن كَفَرَ بِٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعْدِ إِيمَـٰنِهِۦٓ إِلَّا مَنْ أُكْرِهَ وَقَلْبُهُۥ مُطْمَئِنٌّۢ بِٱلْإِيمَـٰنِ وَلَـٰكِن مَّن شَرَحَ بِٱلْكُفْرِ صَدْرًا فَعَلَيْهِمْ غَضَبٌ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ
verses.english: Whoever disbelieves in Allah after his belief... except for one who is forced [to renounce his religion] while his heart is secure in faith. But those who [willingly] open their breasts to disbelief, upon them is wrath from Allah, and for them is a great punishment;
verses.hausa: Wanda ya kãfirta da Allah daga bãyan ĩmãninsa, fãce wanda aka tĩlasta alhãli kuwa zũciyarsa tanã natse da ĩmãni kuma wanda ya yi farin ciki da kãfirci, to, akwai fushi a kansa daga Allah, kuma sunã da wata azãba mai girma.

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمُ ٱسْتَحَبُّوا۟ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا عَلَى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.english: That is because they preferred the worldly life over the Hereafter and that Allah does not guide the disbelieving people.
verses.hausa: Waɗancan ne kãfirai dõmin sun fĩfĩta son dũniya a kan Lãhira, kuma lalle ne Allah bã Ya shiryar da mutãne kãfirai.

verses.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ طَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ وَسَمْعِهِمْ وَأَبْصَـٰرِهِمْ ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْغَـٰفِلُونَ
verses.english: Those are the ones over whose hearts and hearing and vision Allah has sealed, and it is those who are the heedless.
verses.hausa: Waɗancan ne waɗanda Allah Ya bice hasken zukãtansu da jinsu da gannansu. Kuma waɗancan sũ ne gafalallu.

verses.arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمْ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ
verses.english: Assuredly, it is they, in the Hereafter, who will be the losers.
verses.hausa: Bãbu shakka lalle ne a Lãhira sũ ne mãsu hasãra.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لِلَّذِينَ هَاجَرُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا فُتِنُوا۟ ثُمَّ جَـٰهَدُوا۟ وَصَبَرُوٓا۟ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهَا لَغَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.english: Then, indeed your Lord, to those who emigrated after they had been compelled [to renounce their religion] and thereafter fought [for the cause of Allah] and were patient - indeed, your Lord, after that, is Forgiving and Merciful
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan kuma lalle ne Ubangijinka ga waɗanda suka yi hijirã daga bãyan an fitine su, sa'an nan kuma suka yi jihãdi, kuma suka yi haƙuri, lalle ne Ubangijinka, daga bãyanta haƙĩƙa Mai gãfara ne, Mai jin ƙai.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ تَأْتِى كُلُّ نَفْسٍ تُجَـٰدِلُ عَن نَّفْسِهَا وَتُوَفَّىٰ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّا عَمِلَتْ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
verses.english: On the Day when every soul will come disputing for itself, and every soul will be fully compensated for what it did, and they will not be wronged.
verses.hausa: A rãnar da kõwane rai zai je yanã jãyayyar tunkuɗẽwa daga kansa, kuma a cika wa kõwane rai (sakamakon) abin da ya aikata, kuma sũ bã zã a zãlunce su ba.

verses.arabic: وَضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلًا قَرْيَةً كَانَتْ ءَامِنَةً مُّطْمَئِنَّةً يَأْتِيهَا رِزْقُهَا رَغَدًا مِّن كُلِّ مَكَانٍ فَكَفَرَتْ بِأَنْعُمِ ٱللَّهِ فَأَذَٰقَهَا ٱللَّهُ لِبَاسَ ٱلْجُوعِ وَٱلْخَوْفِ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَصْنَعُونَ
verses.english: And Allah presents an example: a city which was safe and secure, its provision coming to it in abundance from every location, but it denied the favors of Allah. So Allah made it taste the envelopment of hunger and fear for what they had been doing.
verses.hausa: Kuma Allah Ya buga misãli, wata alƙarya ta kasance amintacciyã, natsattsiyã, arzikinta yanã je mata a wadãce daga kõwane wuri sai ta kãfirta da ni'imõmin Allah, sabõda haka Allah ya ɗanɗana mata tufãfin yunwa da tsõro, sabõda abin da suka kasance sunã sanã'antãwa.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ وَهُمْ ظَـٰلِمُونَ
verses.english: And there had certainly come to them a Messenger from among themselves, but they denied him; so punishment overtook them while they were wrongdoers.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne haƙĩƙa wani Manzo daga gare su, ya jẽmusu, sai suka ƙaryata shi, sabõda haka azãba ta kãma su, alhãli kuwa sũ ne mãsu zãlunci.

verses.arabic: فَكُلُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ حَلَـٰلًا طَيِّبًا وَٱشْكُرُوا۟ نِعْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ إِن كُنتُمْ إِيَّاهُ تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.english: Then eat of what Allah has provided for you [which is] lawful and good. And be grateful for the favor of Allah, if it is [indeed] Him that you worship.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan ku ci daga abin da Allah Ya azurta ku da shi, halas, kuma mai dãɗi, kuma ku gõde wa ni'imar Allah idan kun kasance shi kuke bautãwa.

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا حَرَّمَ عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْمَيْتَةَ وَٱلدَّمَ وَلَحْمَ ٱلْخِنزِيرِ وَمَآ أُهِلَّ لِغَيْرِ ٱللَّهِ بِهِۦ ۖ فَمَنِ ٱضْطُرَّ غَيْرَ بَاغٍ وَلَا عَادٍ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.english: He has only forbidden to you dead animals, blood, the flesh of swine, and that which has been dedicated to other than Allah. But whoever is forced [by necessity], neither desiring [it] nor transgressing [its limit] - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
verses.hausa: Abin sani kawai (Allah) Ya haramta muku mussai da jini da nãman alade da abin da aka ambaci sũnan wanin Allah game da shi. Sa'an nan wanda aka tĩlastaa kan jama'a kuma baicin mai zãlunci, to, lalle Allah ne Mai gãfara, Mai jin ƙai.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَقُولُوا۟ لِمَا تَصِفُ أَلْسِنَتُكُمُ ٱلْكَذِبَ هَـٰذَا حَلَـٰلٌ وَهَـٰذَا حَرَامٌ لِّتَفْتَرُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلْكَذِبَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَفْتَرُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلْكَذِبَ لَا يُفْلِحُونَ
verses.english: And do not say about what your tongues assert of untruth, "This is lawful and this is unlawful," to invent falsehood about Allah. Indeed, those who invent falsehood about Allah will not succeed.
verses.hausa: Kuma kada ku ce, dõmin abin da harsunanku suke siffantawa da ƙarya, "Wannan halas ne, kuma wannan harãmun ne." Dõmin ku ƙirƙira ƙarya ga Allah. Lalle ne, waɗanda suke ƙirƙira ƙarya ga Allah bã zã su ci nasara ba.

verses.arabic: مَتَـٰعٌ قَلِيلٌ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.english: [It is but] a brief enjoyment, and they will have a painful punishment.
verses.hausa: Jin dãɗi ne kaɗan. Kuma sunã da wata azãba mai raɗaɗi.

verses.arabic: وَعَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ هَادُوا۟ حَرَّمْنَا مَا قَصَصْنَا عَلَيْكَ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَمَا ظَلَمْنَـٰهُمْ وَلَـٰكِن كَانُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ يَظْلِمُونَ
verses.english: And to those who are Jews We have prohibited that which We related to you before. And We did not wrong them [thereby], but they were wronging themselves.
verses.hausa: Kuma kan waɗanda suka tũba (Yãhũdu) Mun haramta abin da Muka bãyar da lãbari a gare ka daga gabãni, kuma ba Mu zãlunce su ba, amma sun kasance kansu suke zãlunta.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لِلَّذِينَ عَمِلُوا۟ ٱلسُّوٓءَ بِجَهَـٰلَةٍ ثُمَّ تَابُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ وَأَصْلَحُوٓا۟ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهَا لَغَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.english: Then, indeed your Lord, to those who have done wrong out of ignorance and then repent after that and correct themselves - indeed, your Lord, thereafter, is Forgiving and Merciful.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan kuma lalle ne Ubangijinka ga waɗanda suka aikata mummunan aiki da jãhilci, sa'an nan suka tũba daga bãyan wancan, kuma suka gyãra, lalle ne Ubangijinka, daga bãyanta haƙĩƙa Mai gãfara ne, Mai jin ƙai.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ كَانَ أُمَّةً قَانِتًا لِّلَّهِ حَنِيفًا وَلَمْ يَكُ مِنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
verses.english: Indeed, Abraham was a [comprehensive] leader, devoutly obedient to Allah, inclining toward truth, and he was not of those who associate others with Allah.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne Ibrãhĩm ya kasance shũgaba, mai ƙasƙantar da kai ga Allah, mai karkatã zuwa ga gaskiya, kuma bai kasance daga mãsu shirki ba.

verses.arabic: شَاكِرًا لِّأَنْعُمِهِ ۚ ٱجْتَبَىٰهُ وَهَدَىٰهُ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.english: [He was] grateful for His favors. Allah chose him and guided him to a straight path.
verses.hausa: Mai gõdiya ga ni'imominSa (Allah), Ya zãɓe shi, kuma Ya shiryar da shi zuwa ga tafarki madaidaici.

verses.arabic: وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً ۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ لَمِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
verses.english: And We gave him good in this world, and indeed, in the Hereafter he will be among the righteous.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka ba shi alhẽri a cikin dũniya, Kuma lalle shĩ, a Lãhira, yanã daga sãlihai.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْكَ أَنِ ٱتَّبِعْ مِلَّةَ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ حَنِيفًا ۖ وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
verses.english: Then We revealed to you, [O Muhammad], to follow the religion of Abraham, inclining toward truth; and he was not of those who associate with Allah.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan kuma Muka yi wahayi zuwa gare ka (cẽwa), "Ka bi aƙĩdar Ibrahĩm, mai karkatã zuwa ga gaskiya, kuma bai kasance daga mãsu shirki ba.'

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا جُعِلَ ٱلسَّبْتُ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ٱخْتَلَفُوا۟ فِيهِ ۚ وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَيَحْكُمُ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ فِيمَا كَانُوا۟ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ
verses.english: The sabbath was only appointed for those who differed over it. And indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ.
verses.hausa: Abin sani kawai, an sanya Asabar a kan waɗanda suka sãɓã wajũna a cikin sha'aninsa. Kuma lalle ne Ubangijinka, haƙĩƙa, Yanã yin hukunci a tsakaninsu a Rãnar ¡iyãma a cikin abin da suka kasance a cikinsa sunã sãɓã wa jũnã.

verses.arabic: ٱدْعُ إِلَىٰ سَبِيلِ رَبِّكَ بِٱلْحِكْمَةِ وَٱلْمَوْعِظَةِ ٱلْحَسَنَةِ ۖ وَجَـٰدِلْهُم بِٱلَّتِى هِىَ أَحْسَنُ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ ۖ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلْمُهْتَدِينَ
verses.english: Invite to the way of your Lord with wisdom and good instruction, and argue with them in a way that is best. Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who has strayed from His way, and He is most knowing of who is [rightly] guided.
verses.hausa: Ka yi kira zuwa ga hanyar Ubangijinka da hikima da wa'azi mai kyau kuma ka yi jãyayya da su da magana wadda take mafi kyau. Lalle ne Ubangijinka Shĩ neMafi sani ga wanda ya ɓãce daga hanyarSa, kuma Shi ne Mafi sani ga mãsu shiryuwa.

verses.arabic: وَإِنْ عَاقَبْتُمْ فَعَاقِبُوا۟ بِمِثْلِ مَا عُوقِبْتُم بِهِۦ ۖ وَلَئِن صَبَرْتُمْ لَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لِّلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
verses.english: And if you punish [an enemy, O believers], punish with an equivalent of that with which you were harmed. But if you are patient - it is better for those who are patient.
verses.hausa: Kuma idan kuka sãka wa uƙũba to ku sãka wa uƙũba da misãlin abin da aka yi muku uƙũbar da shi. Kuma idan kun yi haƙuri, lalle shĩ ne mafi alhẽri ga mãsu haƙuri.

verses.arabic: وَٱصْبِرْ وَمَا صَبْرُكَ إِلَّا بِٱللَّهِ ۚ وَلَا تَحْزَنْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا تَكُ فِى ضَيْقٍ مِّمَّا يَمْكُرُونَ
verses.english: And be patient, [O Muhammad], and your patience is not but through Allah. And do not grieve over them and do not be in distress over what they conspire.
verses.hausa: Kuma ka yi haƙuri, kuma haƙurinka bã zai zama ba fãce dõmin Allah, kuma kada ka yi baƙin ciki sabo da su, kuma kada ka kasance a cikin ƙuncin rai daga abin da suke yi na mãkirci.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوا۟ وَّٱلَّذِينَ هُم مُّحْسِنُونَ
verses.english: Indeed, Allah is with those who fear Him and those who are doers of good.
verses.hausa: Lalle Allah Yanã tãre da waɗanda suka yi taƙawa da waɗanda suke sũ mãsu kyautatãwa ne.
